mapper.select: select sp_industry_item_cate.i_item_name ,sp_industry_item_cate.i_item_number ,sp_industry_item_cate.industry_number from sp_industry_item_cate where sp_industry_item_cate.i_item_number = #{iItemNumber}

select sp_industry_item_cate.i_item_number ,sp_industry_item_cate.industry_number ,sp_industry_cate.industry_name ,sp_industry_item_cate.i_item_name ,sp_industry_item_cate.a_number ,sp_agency.a_name from sp_industry_item_cate join sp_agency join sp_industry_cate on sp_industry_item_cate.industry_number = sp_industry_cate.industry_number and sp_industry_item_cate.a_number = sp_agency.a_number where sp_agency.a_name like #{aName} and sp_industry_cate.industry_name like #{industryName} and sp_industry_item_cate.i_item_name like #{iItemName}

select sp_industry_item_cate.i_item_number ,sp_industry_item_cate.industry_number ,sp_industry_cate.industry_name ,sp_industry_item_cate.i_item_name ,sp_industry_item_cate.a_number ,sp_agency.a_name from sp_industry_item_cate join sp_agency join sp_industry_cate on sp_industry_item_cate.industry_number = sp_industry_cate.industry_number and sp_industry_item_cate.a_number = sp_agency.a_number
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sp_industry_item_cate (industry_number, a_number, i_item_name) VALUES (#{industryNumber}, #{aNumber}, #{iItemName})
